amendment.description: Amendment requires the Comptroller General of the United States to conduct a study of the consolidation of the refiners, importers, producers, and wholesalers of gasoline with the sellers of such gasoline at retail.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 24 printed in House Report 109-49 to direct the Comptroller General of the United States to conduct a study on the impact of the consolidation of gasoline wholesales (and above) on the gasoline retail market.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Israel amendment Agreed to by recorded vote: 302 - 128 (Roll no. 126).
